TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示电子邮件发件人或收件人的地址。

span.span: Represents the address of an electronic mail sender or recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由和类来存储地址信息的电子邮件。The class is used by the and classes to store address information for email messages. 电子邮件地址组成名称，名称和 （可选） 。A mail address is composed of a name, name and optionally, a . 可以包含非 ASCII 字符，如果你对它们进行编码。The can contain non-ASCII characters if you encode them. 类支持以下的邮件地址格式：The class supports the following mail address formats: - 简单的地址格式为`user@host`。A simple address format of `user@host`. 如果未设置，这是生成的邮件地址格式。If a is not set, this is the mail address format generated. - 标准带引号的显示名称格式为`"display name" `。A standard quoted display name format of `"display name" `. 如果设置，这是生成的格式。If a is set, this is the format generated. - 在前后添加命令的尖括号名称，名称`"display name" user@host`如果这些信息将不包含。Angle brackets are added around the name, name for `"display name" user@host` if these are not included. - 在前后添加引号为`display name `，如果这些信息将不包含。Quotes are added around the for `display name `, if these are not included. - 中支持的 Unicode 字符属性。Unicode characters are supported in the property. - A带引号名称。A name with quotes. 例如 `"user name"@host`。For example, `"user name"@host`. - 在用户名中的连续和尾随点。Consecutive and trailing dots in user names. 例如 `user...name..@host`。For example, `user...name..@host`. - 用括号括起来的域文本。Bracketed domain literals. 例如 ``。For example, ``. - 注释。Comments. 例如 `(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`。For example, `(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`. 在传输之前删除注释。Comments are removed before transmission. 逗号用于分隔的邮件地址列表中的元素。A comma is used to separate elements in a list of mail addresses. 因此，不应在列表中的带引号的显示名称中使用逗号。As a result, a comma should not be used in unquoted display names in a list. 将允许使用以下的邮件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John, Doe" , "Bob, Smith" ` 不允许以下的邮件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `John, Doe , Bob, Smith ` 引号可嵌入到带引号的字符串，但它们必须进行转义。Quotes can be embedded in a quoted string, but they must be escaped. 将允许使用以下的邮件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John \"Jr\" Doe" ` `"\"John \\\"Jr\\\" Doe\" "` 不允许以下的邮件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `"John "Jr" Doe" ` 如果用户名已被引用的说明，开始的字符串 （或逗号） 之间的所有文本，并且地址被视为的一部分，包括注释。When the username is note quoted, all text between the start of the string (or comma) and the address are considered part of the , including comments. 例如:For example: `(non comment) unquoted display (non comment) name (non comment) ` 尽管类接受电子邮件地址，如有效，则其他邮件服务器可能无法接收的邮件地址。Although the class accepts a mail address as valid, other mail servers may not accept the mail address. 类不支持以下的邮件地址格式：The class does not support the following mail address formats: - 混合使用带引号和不带引号的显示名称。Mixed quoted and unquoted display names. 例如 `display "name" `。For example, `display "name" `. - 组，在 RFC 2822 第 3.4 发布 IETF 的节中定义。Groups, as defined in RFC 2822 Section 3.4 published by the IETF. - 已过时的用户名称格式`"user"."name"@host`，`user."name"@host`或`"user".name@host`。The obsolete user name formats of `"user"."name"@host`, `user."name"@host` or `"user".name@host`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用发送电子邮件， ，和类。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message by using the , , and classes. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `address`参数可以包含显示名称和关联的电子邮件地址，如果将地址括在尖括号中。The `address` parameter can contain a display name and the associated email address if you enclose the address in angle brackets. 例如:For example: `"Tom Smith "` 显示名称和命令的尖括号之间允许存在空白。White space is permitted between the display name and the angle brackets. 下表显示的属性值使用前面的示例地址构造的对象。The following table shows the property values for a object constructed using the preceding example address. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`"Tom Smith"`| ||`"contoso.com"`| ||`"tsmith"`| ||`"tsmith@contoso.com"`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数创建对象收件人的电子邮件。The following code example uses this constructor to create a object for the recipient of an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

summary.span: 使用指定的地址和显示名初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified address and display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将保留显示名称中的前导和尾随空白。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果`displayName`包含非 ASCII 字符，用于 iso-8859-1 字符集`displayName`编码。If `displayName` contains non-ASCII characters, the iso-8859-1 character set is used for the `displayName` encoding. 非 ASCII 字符进行编码时在 RFC 1522，位于中讨论[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org)。Encoding non-ASCII characters is discussed in RFC 1522, which is available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org). 如果`address`包含显示名称和`displayName`不`null`和不等于，`displayName`重写中指定的值`address`。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数创建发件人和收件人电子邮件的实例。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender and recipient of an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将保留显示名称中的前导和尾随空白。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果`address`包含显示名称和`displayName`不`null`和不等于，`displayName`重写中指定的值`address`。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. 方法不会检查如果`displayName`参数才有效。The method does not check if the `displayName` parameter is valid. 此方法可以删除不显示的周围的引号属性。This method removes surrounding quotes not displayed by the property. 将传输，除非前添加引号或中指定`displayNameEncoding`参数。Quotes will be added before transmission, except where or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 中指定的编码`displayNameEncoding`参数将应用于属性在传输之前或中指定`displayNameEncoding`参数。The encoding specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter will be applied to the property before transmission or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 默认的编码如果未指定。 is the default encoding if none is specified. 有关受支持的邮件地址的格式的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on supported mail address formats, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数创建发件人的电子邮件的实例。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可读的形式返回包含非 ASCII 字符的显示名称。Display names that contain non-ASCII characters are returned in human-readable form. 使用方法以获取编码的形式。Use the method to get the encoded form of the . 用于读取电子邮件某些软件程序显示属性值而不是，或除了电子邮件地址。Some software programs that are used to read email display the property value instead of, or in addition to, the email address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示以电子邮件消息的接收方。The following code example displays the for the recipient of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的邮件地址的哈希代码。The method returns a hash code of the mail address. 此值可以用作哈希表中的键。This value can be used as a key in hash tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的电子邮件地址中，主机字符串包含所有信息下列"`@`"登录。In a typical email address, the host string includes all information following the "`@`" sign. 例如，在`"tsmith@contoso.com"`，该主机是`"contoso.com"`。For example, in `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, the host is `"contoso.com"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示电子邮件消息的目标。The following code example displays the destination of an email message.
